accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records ten years old or older are open for research.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The Knight Foundation records are arranged in record groups primarily by record type.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The collection was deposited at the Rockefeller Archive Center by the Knight Foundation in 2021.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Knight Foundation has title, copyright and literary rights in the collection, in so far as it holds them.

The Rockefeller Archive Center has authority to grant permission to cite and publish material from the collection. Permission to publish extensive excerpts, or material in its entirety, will be referred to the Knight Foundation.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The Knight Foundation records are currently being processed. Additional recordswill be added to this collection as they become available for research.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The John S. and James L. Knight Foundation is a Miami-based non-profit organization. The Knight Foundation was established in 1940 and was originally called the Knight Memorial Education Fund which operated out of Akron, Ohio. The Knight Foundation provides grants to 26 Knight Foundation Communities in the United States with a focus on arts, communities, journalism, technology, and learning and impact.
